alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:38PM MST until January 09 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches. Locally higher amounts possible Idaho Palouse to north of Coeur d`Alene. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Plummer, Tekoa, Spokane Valley, Coulee City, La Crosse, Potlatch, Coeur d`Alene, Davenport, Rosalia, Cheney, Wilbur, Post Falls, Airway Heights, Ritzville, Hayden, Harrington, Fairfield, Odessa, Oakesdale, Genesee, Worley, Grand Coulee, Colfax, Uniontown, Moscow, Rockford, Downtown Spokane, Pullman, and Creston. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact travel Monday night. Strong winds could cause localized damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
